-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Deserialize from HDBC rows to FromJSON instances
--   
@package hdbc-aeson
@version 0.1.3.2

module Database.HDBC.Aeson

-- | Run a SQL query and return a value that can be cast via a FromJSON
--   instance.
executeJ :: FromJSON a => Statement -> [SqlValue] -> IO a

-- | A quick way to do a query and cast it to a FromJSON.
quickQueryJ :: (IConnection a, FromJSON b) => a -> String -> [SqlValue] -> IO b
instance Convertible SqlValue Value
instance ToJSON SqlValue
